workout_groups.name: Core Control Drills
workout_groups.description: Exercises to improve core control and stability.

workouts.name: Plank
workouts.description: Hold a plank position for 1 minute.

workouts.name: Side Plank
workouts.description: Hold a side plank position for 1 minute on each side.

workouts.name: Bird Dog
workouts.description: Perform bird dog exercise for 2 minutes.

workouts.name: Dead Bug
workouts.description: Perform dead bug exercise for 2 minutes.

workout_groups.name: Intermediate Core Stability
workout_groups.description: Core stability exercises for intermediate levels.

workouts.name: Plank with Leg Lift
workouts.description: Hold a plank position and lift one leg for 1 minute.

workouts.name: Side Plank with Hip Dips
workouts.description: Perform side plank with hip dips for 1 minute on each side.

workouts.name: Bird Dog with Elbow to Knee
workouts.description: Perform bird dog with elbow to knee touch for 2 minutes.

workouts.name: Dead Bug with Leg Extension
workouts.description: Perform dead bug with leg extension for 2 minutes.

workouts.name: Plank with Arm Reach
workouts.description: Hold a plank position and reach one arm forward for 1 minute.

workouts.name: Side Plank with Leg Lift
workouts.description: Perform side plank with leg lift for 1 minute on each side.

workouts.name: Bird Dog with Resistance Band
workouts.description: Perform bird dog with resistance band for 2 minutes.

workouts.name: Dead Bug with Resistance Band
workouts.description: Perform dead bug with resistance band for 2 minutes.

workout_groups.name: Core Control Challenges
workout_groups.description: Core control exercises for higher difficulty levels.

workouts.name: Plank with Arm and Leg Lift
workouts.description: Hold a plank position and lift one arm and one leg for 1 minute.

workouts.name: Side Plank with Leg Lift and Reach
workouts.description: Perform side plank with leg lift and reach for 1 minute on each side.

workouts.name: Bird Dog with Resistance Band and Reach
workouts.description: Perform bird dog with resistance band and reach for 2 minutes.

workouts.name: Dead Bug with Resistance Band and Reach
workouts.description: Perform dead bug with resistance band and reach for 2 minutes.
